    • Constructor Detail

      • CircleBeat

        public CircleBeat(java.lang.String filename,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  int r,
                  long time)
        Creates a new circle beat
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the image file to be used for the circle
        x - the x value of the circle beat
        y - the y value of the circle beat
        r - the length of the radius of the circle beat
        time - the time the circle beat should be clicked

      • CircleBeat

        public CircleBeat(java.lang.String filename,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  int r,
                  long time,
                  java.awt.Color c)
        Creates a new circle beat of a certain color
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the image file to be used for the circle beat
        x - the x value of the circle beat
        y - the y value of the circle beat
        r - the length of the radius of the circle beat
        time - the time the circle beat should be clicked
        c - the color of the circle beat
